name: Messagehandler-scripts
body:
### Welcome to Messagehandler-scripts Page.

The repository contains a batch of SQL script for the MessageHandler. 
The repository consists of 2 folders.

* Installation_files
* Separate_Files

### Installation files

This folder is the batch of SQL scripts compressed into two files. 
* 1_MSGHANDLER_DATA.sql - Builds the table structure
* 2_MSGHANDLER_PROC.sql - Contains the required procedures
The "Separate_Files" folder contains each task separately

### The installation 

Connect to you MySQL Client and perform the following commands
To import a database, first create a new blank database in the MySQL shell to serve as a destination for your data.

`mysql > CREATE DATABASE msg;`

Then log out of the MySQL shell and type the following on the command line:


`mysql -uroot -p123456 msg < 1_MSGHANDLER_DATA.sql`

`mysql -uroot -p123456 msg < 2_MSGHANDLER_PROC.sql`
